title: Woman sues Detroit after facial recognition mistakes her for crime suspect
description: Porcha Woodruff was eight months pregnant when she was arrested on her doorstep after facial recognition technology and a victim mistook her for a suspect.

title: AI is acting ‘pro-anorexia’ and tech companies aren’t stopping it
description: New research shows how AI like ChatGPT, Bard and Stable Diffusion could fuel eating disorders with disturbing images and dangerous chatbot advice.
